title: Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Ocean with Breaking Waves and Sun", 1870–85
medium: Graphite on cream wove paper, bound
provenance: Anna Richards Brewster, Scarsdale, NY, 1905-1952; William T. Brewster
creditline: Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest
description: Water across foreground, breaking in left middleground (possibly on a rock). In sky at right-center, the sun is coming through clouds.

tombstone.epitaph:
Sketchbook Folio, "Study of Ocean with Breaking Waves and Sun", 1870–85.
1870–85. Graphite on cream wove paper, bound. Gift of the National Academy of Design from the Mrs. William T. Brewster Bequest. 1953-179-86-44.
